meta.content: Moulton ISD serves students and is located in Moulton, TX.

li.a: Dual Credit Interlocal Agreement Blinn College

div.div:
Home of the
Katz and Kittens
div.marquee: Urgent: Please see information below concerning the superintendent search... Board Member Election date postponed to November 3, 2020... In compliance with Governor Abbot's executive order, the Moulton ISD will continue the suspension of normal district operations and face-to-face instruction until May 4th. Please continue to monitor the District website and social media for additional information and updates.

div.div: The Moulton Independent School District is dedicated to the task of building a solid foundation upon which each and every student can experience meaningful and positive growth. This will be accomplished by an environment that is educationally sound and individually stimulating. We feel that with the involvement of each student along with the commitment of school, home, and community that we can help develop useful, self-supporting, and productive citizens.
